Goal Representation: ['1. Bathe the cat in the bathtub.', '2. Use a towel to dry the cat.']

behavior bathe_cat(cat:item, bathtub:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(cat, bathtub) # Ensure the cat is in the bathtub
        achieve has_water(bathtub) # Ensure the bathtub has water

behavior __goal__():
